product_name: Merrell Origins Wind Rush Pullover Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Mixing the style of old-school anoraks with modern, weather-protective features, the Merrell Origins Wind Rush pullover keeps wind and rain at bay during all your outdoor adventures. Cotton/nylon fabric is coated with a Durable Water Repellent finish that allows water to bead up and roll off, keeping you dry in light rain or snow. Jacket packs into zippered kangaroo pocket for easy storage in a pack; ruching on pocket stormflap adds a touch of modern style. Tall, ruched collar protects neck and chin and can be tighened with exterior drawcord; elastic cuffs and adjustable hem drawcord seal in warmth. Quarter-zip opening provides immediate ventilation when you need to cool off. Merrell Origins Wind Rush pullover features a relaxed fit that easily fits over other layers. Closeout.
short_description: Mixing the style of old-school anoraks with modern, weather-protective features, the Merrell Origins Wind Rush pullover keeps wind and rain at bay during all your outdoor adventures.
